In a statement, the college said: “Following a thorough review of the future of the RA, we believe that the best way forward for the college is to re-open as soon as possible under the leadership of a new director and new management. We look forward to working with the new team in order to further develop the RA as a vital platform for exhibitions and education in the UK, at a time when the college is keen to be more welcoming and engaging for everyone.”The announcement of the spring 2020 edition of the RA has yet to be made.
